name: Corey Lawrence
headline: Full stack marketer and engineer who builds AI powered systems that drive growth and reduce manual work.
professional_summary: I have delivered more than 100 marketing and technical projects across multiple industries. Eight years at Highland taught me what drives real commercial results, not vanity metrics. The last several years in tech roles at Phonelo AI and Ashton Gray gave me the engineering experience to build systems that support those outcomes. This mix lets me do something most cannot. I can identify what the business needs, design the customer facing experience, and then build the automation, data flows, and AI tooling that make the process scalable. I enjoy solving problems at the point where business goals, modern technology, and real user behavior meet.

marketing_summary.overview: 10 years of marketing experience, including eight years at Highland International where I moved from specialist to manager to head of marketing. That time gave me a ground up understanding of how customers behave, how markets shift, and what actually drives growth. I did not inherit marketing systems. I built them, tested them, and refined them with real revenue outcomes. That experience now informs how I design and connect technology, automation, and AI tools to business goals.

experience_depth.full_funnel: I learned how to run the entire lifecycle of demand generation. I conducted customer research, developed messaging based on real objections, built campaigns that targeted each awareness stage, and connected everything to sales outcomes. I have created SEO strategies, paid search structures, landing pages, email nurture paths, and analytics dashboards that tracked progress from interest to revenue.
experience_depth.seo_and_content: I rebuilt site structure around intent clusters, cleaned up index bloat, and aligned metadata with how people searched rather than how the business described itself. I created anchor content that drew traffic from national competitors and used internal linking and page authority to lift entire product lines in search. That work tripled organic traffic and created steady compounding gains.
experience_depth.paid_search: I ran paid campaigns that produced measurable results instead of vanity traffic. I refined keyword strategy, developed landing page alignment, reduced wasted spend through negative keyword filters, and used call tracking to confirm attribution. I paused campaigns that brought leads but not pipeline and focused budget where outcomes proved themselves. This doubled qualified leads while reducing cost per conversion.
experience_depth.product_launches: I launched multiple products from concept to revenue. I did the market research, messaging strategy, label design, sales collateral, online positioning, and distributor enablement. That experience taught me how to align marketing, product, and sales so that the story, offer, and delivery were unified.
experience_depth.content_strategy: I wrote copy, guides, articles, landing pages, email sequences, and collateral that supported real sales conversations. I tested headlines, structure, and tone until the market confirmed what worked. I learned what makes someone click and what makes them buy.
experience_depth.cross_functional_alignment: I worked directly with leadership to tie campaigns to revenue goals. I partnered with sales teams to understand objections and built materials that supported those conversations. I created reporting that gave leaders clarity instead of noise. This taught me how to move teams from ideas to execution.

marketing_summary.how_it_connects_to_my_tech_work: My marketing foundation lets me build technology, automation, and AI systems that do not sit in isolation. I understand what needs to happen between a campaign and a closed deal, so when I build tools, they serve a real business purpose. This combination of marketing experience and engineering skill lets me solve problems end to end instead of handing off incomplete work.

key_metrics.online_revenue: From 50K to more than 250K per year
key_metrics.qualified_leads: Doubled through paid and organic improvements

experience_summary: Over 100 projects delivered across marketing and engineering. I combine customer insight with hands on technical execution to create workflows that cut waste, increase clarity, and support measurable growth.
unique_value: Lots of people can run campaigns and lots of people can write code. Very few can do both well enough to connect strategy, brand, data, and automation into a system that produces repeatable outcomes. That is where I am strongest.

featured_projects.name: Comfort Airlines Aircraft Simulator
featured_projects.subtitle: Full-Stack Airline Operations Simulation Platform
featured_projects.description: A comprehensive simulation platform that models airline operations over a two week period, combining a robust Python backend for flight, aircraft, and passenger scheduling with a user friendly web interface for visualization and interaction. Designed for educational and analytical exploration of airline logistics, profitability, and operational strategy.
key_features: Backend simulation engine models flights, aircraft, passengers, and finances, generating detailed CSV reports.
Frontend web interface (HTML, JS, CSS) for dashboards, ticketing, and interactive visualizations.
Intuitive GUI for ticket purchasing, dashboards, timetables, and aircraft activity playback.
Playback controls for financial and operational reports, enabling users to see profit and activity over time.
Simulation of 400,597 passengers and 3,475 flights, achieving $263M+ net profit in two simulated weeks.
technical_highlights: Python backend with modular simulation, scheduling, and reporting logic.
Detailed algorithm documentation and modular codebase for extensibility.
Frontend built with vanilla JS, HTML, and CSS for broad compatibility.
Interactive map and dashboards for visualizing simulation results.
Granular CSV reporting for aircraft, airports, flights, passengers, and financials.
featured_projects.impact: Delivered an accessible, end to end simulation and visualization tool for exploring the complexities of airline operations, from scheduling and logistics to financial outcomes. The project demonstrates full stack development, automation, and the ability to translate complex business logic into an engaging, educational platform.

featured_projects.overview: Led the complete rebuild of Ashton Gray's corporate website, transforming it from static files into a modern, CMS driven platform powered by Sanity, Eleventy, and GitHub Actions. Delivered a fully automated, SEO optimized, and highly performant site designed for scalability, ease of content management, and polished user experience.
key_achievements: Designed and implemented a scalable content model in Sanity CMS, including schemas for properties, homepage, team members, site settings, and investor pages.
Built a dynamic static site pipeline with Eleventy and Nunjucks, generating fully SEO optimized, crawlable pages for every property and core site section.
Developed Node.js automation scripts for content export, image and video caching, and smart rebuild logic that only regenerates changed pages.
Implemented GitHub Actions workflows for both fast builds (content only updates) and full builds (complete site rebuild), connected directly to Sanity webhooks for automatic deployment.
Created a robust property media system supporting both images and videos in carousels with auto play and responsive handling.
Optimized website performance and Core Web Vitals (FCP 0.7s, LCP 1.1s, TBT 110ms, CLS 0.047, Speed Index 1.1s) achieving Lighthouse scores of 98 Performance, 93 Accessibility, and 100 SEO.
Developed an advanced Property Contact Modal with full validation, session aware form handling, smooth animations, and direct URL parameter access (?contact=true).
Built a Smart Return to Map feature with state caching so users can browse properties, view details, and return to their previous map view seamlessly.
Implemented custom User Metrics system with session management, IP based geolocation, scroll depth tracking, file download tracking, and form analytics.
Developed a full featured Investors Page with interactive charts (Chart.js), animated demographic wave charts, returns calculators, and an interactive property portfolio map.
Refined dropdown menus with GSAP animations and integrated them across mobile and desktop for category based navigation.
Improved accessibility and responsiveness across all site sections, including modals, carousels, headers, and footers.

Integrated dynamic tracking script management in Sanity CMS, enabling client control over Google Tag Manager, LinkedIn, HubSpot, and other third party scripts with header and footer placement options.
Added automated SEO tools: sitemap generator, JSON LD structured data for RealEstateListing schema, and hidden semantic enhancements for search engine indexing.
featured_projects.impact: Delivered a CMS powered website where Ashton Gray's team can independently manage property listings, investor content, team profiles, and tracking scripts without developer intervention. Automated builds reduced deployment time while performance optimizations positioned the site for stronger SEO rankings, smoother user experiences, and better scalability for future growth.

featured_projects.name: Music Player PWA
featured_projects.subtitle: Progressive Web App
featured_projects.description: A Progressive Web App music player that offers efficient audio playback with dynamic song management capabilities. Features intelligent audio preloading based on network connectivity, offline functionality, and integration with device media controls.
key_features: Offline capability - works without internet after initial load
Cross platform installation on iOS and Android devices
Intelligent audio preloading based on network conditions
Integration with Media Session API for native device controls
Dynamic playlist management and audio library organization
Responsive design optimized for both mobile and desktop experiences
technical_highlights: JavaScript for audio management and buffering
Service Worker implementation for offline functionality
PWA architecture following modern web standards
Media Session API integration for system level audio controls
Performance optimization for various network conditions

featured_projects.name: DevolveAI
featured_projects.subtitle: AI-Powered Decompiler
featured_projects.description: An AI supported tool that transforms compiled executables into readable source code through a simple web interface. Makes reverse engineering more accessible to developers by reducing setup friction and guiding users through the process.
key_features: AI assisted decompilation of executable files into readable code
Web based interface accessible from any browser
Refine feature for code language conversion and comment addition
Approachable experience for developers who are new to reverse engineering
Support for multiple programming languages in output
Customizable code formatting and documentation generation
technical_highlights: Integration with Google Gemini AI for code analysis support
Multi language backend supporting Python and PHP
File processing and executable analysis pipeline
Real time AI processing with user friendly feedback
Cross platform web deployment for universal accessibility

featured_projects.name: AdventureAI
featured_projects.subtitle: AI-Powered Adventure Game
featured_projects.description: A choose your own adventure style game powered by AI that creates dynamic storytelling experiences. Built with responsive design and a focus on easy interaction so users can quickly jump into new stories on any device.
key_features: AI generated storytelling with unique narratives each session
12 different adventure settings to shape narrative direction
Shared gameplay database allowing users to explore others' adventures
Responsive design optimized for both mobile and desktop
Light, humorous tone with simple visual presentation
Real time story updates based on player choices
technical_highlights: AI integration for dynamic content generation
Story branching and narrative state management
Database architecture for shared user experiences
Responsive web design with mobile first approach
Performance optimization for real time interactions

career.title: Head of Marketing
career.summary: Owned product lifecycles, directed digital campaigns, and led a major web transformation that significantly boosted traffic and revenue.
key_responsibilities: Led the seamless transition of the company website from HTTP to HTTPS, boosting security and SEO rankings.
Increased organic search traffic by 300% through targeted SEO strategies and data driven content optimization.
Directed brand positioning and messaging across digital, print, and product marketing channels.
Developed and executed integrated marketing strategies in collaboration with company leadership.
Managed email marketing campaigns and wrote blog content to strengthen customer engagement.
Conducted professional product photography to elevate marketing visuals across all platforms.
Oversaw the full marketing function, ensuring initiatives supported overarching business objectives.
Owned multiple products across lifecycle, from ideation to sales.
Directed a full web redesign with SEO and paid ad strategy, increasing online revenue by 400%.
Designed product labels, packaging, brochures, and digital campaigns.
Tripled organic traffic and outranked national competitors.
Aligned marketing with sales strategies to grow market presence.

career.title: Marketing Manager
career.summary: Managed campaigns across several product lines, refined targeting strategies, and improved branding.
key_responsibilities: Designed and executed Google Ads campaigns, doubling qualified leads through ongoing optimization.
Implemented SEO strategies that improved search rankings and drove consistent traffic growth.
Oversaw the redesign of product labels and marketing materials to enhance brand identity.
Coordinated multi channel campaigns while mentoring newer marketing team members.
Executed Google Ads campaigns that doubled qualified leads.
Oversaw packaging redesigns and collateral updates for brand consistency.
Coordinated multi channel marketing campaigns.

career.title: Marketing Specialist
career.summary: Supported product launches with content, collateral, and campaign execution.
key_responsibilities: Supported day to day marketing operations, including email campaigns, blog content, and social media updates.
Produced product photography and design assets to strengthen online and offline marketing.
Created print collateral such as flyers, brochures, and mailers to support sales efforts.
Assisted with website maintenance and collaborated with teams on small marketing projects.
Maintained website content and implemented keyword driven updates.
Produced product photography, print collateral, and marketing emails.
Contributed to early product rollouts with research and promotion efforts.

career.title: UI/UX Engineer
career.summary: Focused on front end architecture, accessibility, and user experience for AI powered transcription tools.
key_responsibilities: Developed a responsive React based UI for an AI transcription tool, integrating real time audio syncing and transcript playback.
Implemented accessibility standards (WCAG) to ensure usability across devices and audiences.
Created interactive transitions, animations, and real time state management across components.
Worked with product, backend, and design teams to translate business requirements into user friendly features.
Optimized performance and responsiveness for mobile and desktop.

career.title: Founder | Independent Consultant
career.summary: Provides AI consulting and custom web solutions to help businesses streamline operations and enhance digital presence.
key_responsibilities: Developed tailored AI powered solutions to automate workflows, cut costs, and improve efficiency for small to mid sized businesses.
Designed and deployed custom websites with integrated content management systems.
Worked directly with business owners to translate operational needs into functional, easy to use digital tools.

career.title: Full-Stack Developer
career.summary: Leads the full rebuild and deployment of a real estate development company's web platform, from architecture to front end experience.
key_responsibilities: Rebuilt Ashton Gray's website from scratch using Eleventy, Sanity CMS, and modular design principles.
Hand coded responsive front end with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and GSAP animations.
Connected Sanity CMS content to dynamic Nunjucks templates for maintainable rendering.
Developed Node based scripts for CMS data fetching, image caching, and automated build triggers.
Set up GitHub Actions for CI/CD deployment tied to content updates.
Optimized SEO, caching, and image handling to improve page speed and search rankings.
Collaborated with stakeholders to ensure tools and features align with business goals.
career.proud_of: I am especially proud of this Ashton Gray project because it let me merge my marketing background with my technical skills. I was able to think about brand story, investor needs, and user flow while also owning the architecture, front end, hosting, and automated build systems. It is a clear example of how I connect business goals with practical engineering.

learning_and_growth.industry_trends: I keep up with developments in AI, marketing, and engineering by testing new tools in real workflows and validating what works. I do not chase trends. I apply what is useful.

dream_project.description: A personal dream project would be an AI supported storytelling and learning platform for kids. Users could pick a themed world and become characters in interactive stories that adapt to their interests and pace. Over time it could scale into longer tales with visuals and voice, making storytelling more playful and personal while staying simple for parents to manage.

dream_collaborator.reason: Turing laid the foundation for modern computing. It would be meaningful to walk through how far applied systems, automation, and AI have come, and to see how he might approach building reliable, human centered tools with what we have today.

professional_traits.work_ethic: Treats every project like it matters
professional_traits.problem_solving: Looks for root causes and builds solutions that last
professional_traits.adaptability: Able to join and improve existing systems quickly
professional_traits.innovation: Knows when to introduce new tools and when to keep things simple
professional_traits.mission_alignment: Prefers work that has a point and delivers value
professional_traits.reputation: Reliable, calm under pressure, and trusted to deliver
